title: feat: add environment map configuration and default environment map for GLB models
description: Adds environment map configuration and a default environment map for GLB models to improve rendering quality.
body: - Introduced `configureRenderer` function to set up the renderer for proper color space and tone mapping. - Added `getDefaultEnvironmentMap` function to generate a default environment map for GLB models, improving their brightness and appearance. - Updated `GltfModel` to apply the default environment map to materials, ensuring consistent rendering. - Created tests to verify the application of the environment map to GLB models. /claim #507

title: add supoort rect_border_radius to smtpads and plated hole
description: Adds support for rectangular border radius to SMT pads and plated holes in the PCB design.

title: Switch 3D snapshots to circuit-json-to-gltf + poppygl (PNG)
description: Replace the simple-3d SVG pipeline with GLTF-based rendering, generating 3D snapshots as PNGs using poppygls rasterizer.
body:
• Replace the simple-3d SVG pipeline with GLTF-based rendering:               
    • circuit-json -> circuit-json-to-gltf (GLTF/GLB)                          
    • GLTF/GLB -> PNG via poppygl                                              
 • 3D snapshots are now PNGs, generated headlessly with poppygl’s pure JS      
   rasterizer.    

/claim #1417
/closes #1417

title: fix: The `extrudeLinear` operation can have an inverted winding order
description: Fixes the inverted winding order issue in the extrudeLinear operation, ensuring correct polygon rendering.
body: ref: https://github.com/tscircuit/jscad-to-gltf/issues/4 The GLF files generate gltf model link (could not upload github did not allow here in the comment so giving Drive) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GTr-ccHnXA26bYYtCLMAwK-qKV1Abg7p/view?usp=sharing

title: docs: extend README API coverage
description: Streamlines the README usage snippet to highlight minimal schematic conversion, adds TypeScript snippets and snapshot links for each API section, and removes obsolete contributing and license sections to keep the documentation focused on usage.

- streamline the README usage snippet to highlight minimal schematic conversion before linking to the detailed converter table
- add TypeScript snippets plus snapshot links for each API section to showcase expected SVG output
- remove obsolete contributing and license sections to keep the documentation focused on usage

title: Fix path simplification tail fallback and add regression test
description: Fixes path simplification to ensure the solver falls back to the original segment when no 45 path can reach the tail, preserving vias and endpoints, and adds a regression test for bug d3f3be1b.
body:
## Summary
- ensure the simplified path solver falls back to the original segment when no 45° path can reach the tail, preserving vias and end points
- add the downloaded bug report assets and a regression test that exercises bug d3f3be1b with an SVG snapshot and DRC assertion
- verify the regression test asserts the final trace terminates at the expected port location

## Testing
- `BUN_UPDATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 bun test tests/bugs/bugreport6-d3f3be.test.ts`
- `bun test tests/bugs/bugreport6-d3f3be.test.ts`
- `NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" bunx tsc --noEmit`

title: models from footprint strings support
description: Adds support for generating 3D models from footprint strings in the circuit-to-3D conversion process.

title: glb loading support
description: Adds support for loading GLB models in the 3D circuit visualization, allowing users to utilize GLB files alongside STL and OBJ formats.

title: add glb model example
description: Adds an example for rendering a GLB model of a circuit board using the tscircuit library.

title: Handle multiple sheet_instances entries in KicadSch
description: Changes the handling of sheet_instances in KicadSch to allow multiple entries, preserving blocks during parsing and exposing them as an array.
body:
## Summary
- treat sheet_instances as a repeatable child of kicad_sch so multiple blocks are preserved when parsing
- expose sheetInstances as an array while keeping the constructor flexible enough to accept a single instance

## Testing
- bunx tsc --noEmit
- bun test tests/sexpr/KicadSchDemos.test.ts *(fails locally: missing kicad-demos fixtures)*

title: Refactor simulator into modular files
description: Summary document a modular directory layout in the README for future feature expansion split the SPICE simulator into focused parsing, analysis, formatting, math, stamping, and utility modules with one exported function per file re-export the new modules through libindex.ts to preserve the public API  Testing bunx tsc --noEmit bun test testsbasicsbasics01.test.ts

## Summary

- split the SPICE simulator into focused parsing, analysis, formatting, math, stamping, and utility modules with one exported function per file
- re-export the new modules through lib/index.ts to preserve the public API

## Testing

- bun test tests/basics/basics01.test.ts
